body.p:
IN THE NAME AND BY THE AUTHORITY OF
The Commonwwealth of Kentucky,
KENTUCKY
UNITED WE STAND DIVIDED WE FALL
BERIAH MAGOFFIN,
GOVERNOR OF SAID COMMONWEALTH,
To all who shall see these Presents, Greeting:

Know Ye, That Ben. H. Bristow having been duly elected to the office of Major of the Enrolled Militia, of Christian County, I do hereby commission him as MAJOR of the Enrolled Militia of said County, investing him with full power and authority to execute and fulfill the duties of the said office according to law: And to have and to hold the same with all the rights and emaluments thereunto legally appertaining, for the term prescribed by law.

figure.ab:
SEAL OF KENTUCKY
UNITED WE STAND DIVIDED WE FALL

body.p: In Testimony Whereof, I have caused these letters to be made patent, and the Seal of the Commonwealth to be hereunto affixed. Done at Frankfort, the 25th day of May, in the year of our Lord one thousand eight hundred and sixty one, and in the 69t year of the Commonwealth.

BY THE GOVERNOR:
Tho. B. Monroe Jr, Secretary of State.
"Yeoman" Office -- J. B. MAJOR, State Printer.
